data.title: What's Behind Your Fujitsu Heat Pump?
meta_keywords: How to use a heat pump efficiently
data.meta_description: What's Behind Your Fujitsu Heat Pump?
data.text:
​Not all heat pumps are created equal. There’s a reason the Heat Pumps NOW team has worked hard to become accredited Fujitsu installers in Christchurch. Fujitsu heat pumps has a lot of benefits, especially when it comes to making your family healthier.

​You might have seen the ad on TV where former Black Cap Captain Stephen Fleming asks, “What’s behind your Fujitsu heat pump?” Heat Pumps NOW is the last in a long line bringing your Fujitsu heat pump to you.

Fujitsu Heat Pump Benefits

​Heat pumps start with a lot of research and development. How can they be more energy efficient, smaller or more powerful? The research put into their heat pumps means Fujitsu was has been awarded NZ’s Heat Pump “Superbrand” for three years straight. That’s quite an achievement.

All heat pumps have air filters, but Fujitsu heat pumps have Catechin Filters that remove the out dust and allergens found in the air. They are approved by the Asthma and Respiratory Foundation NZ’s Sensitive Choice programme, and Fujitsu are the only heat pump brand recommended by Asthma New Zealand.

While most heat pump warranties only last five years, Fujitsu offers a six year warranty on their heat pumps. If there are any issues, you have the peace of mind knowing you’re covered for a long time.

The Importance of Installers

​Buying the right heat pump for your Christchurch home or business is only the beginning. The best heat pump in the world will do you no good if it’s not installed properly.

Fujitsu has an accreditation programme, which means their team assesses our work to judge if we are up to the task. Heat Pumps NOW are accredited Fujitsu heat pump installers - Fujitsu have seen our work and liked it. Our accreditation helps set us apart from the others.

As an accredited installer, we can advise you on where to install your heat pump so you get the most out of it.

Where the heat pump goes in your home is crucial for getting the most out of your heat pump for the lowest cost. They also let you know what heat pump is best for your space, plus it gives you a warranty should anything go wrong. Fujitsu themselves say a professional installation is essential for the efficient performance of any heat pump.
